response.overview: "The Apollo Years" reviews the Apollo missions to the Moon in the 1960's and 1970's. It's back-to-back Apollo told in their own words. It's told by those that made it happen and is an historical retrospective of Apollo's accomplishments. All Missions 1 through 17 are chronicled. All the Apollo astronauts are featured. A celebratory performance by Frank Sinatra is featured. With Apollo Astronauts.
response.title: The Apollo Years
